title: Adopting a Digital Euro
description: Should Finland support the adoption of a digital euro as an official currency alongside physical currency, to facilitate easier and faster digital payments?

title: Strengthening Euro Stability
description: Should Finland advocate for stricter fiscal policies within the Eurozone to enhance the euro's stability and prevent economic crises in member states?

title: Eurozone Financial Aid Contributions
description: Should Finland increase its contributions to financial aid programs within the Eurozone to support economically struggling member states?

title: Increased Education Funding
description: Should Finland increase its budget allocation for education, focusing on improving facilities, digital tools, and curriculum development?

title: Defense Spending Adjustment
description: Given recent geopolitical tensions, should Finland increase its defense budget to enhance national security?

title: Healthcare System Modernization
description: Should Finland allocate more funds to modernize healthcare facilities and incorporate new medical technologies?

title: Funding Renewable Energy Sources
description: To reach climate goals, should Finland increase funding for renewable energy projects, including wind, solar, and bioenergy?

title: Reducing Plastic Waste
description: Should Finland allocate more budget to programs that aim to reduce plastic waste through recycling incentives and public awareness campaigns?

title: Protecting Natural Habitats
description: Should Finland increase funding for the protection and restoration of natural habitats to preserve biodiversity?

title: Universal Basic Income Pilot
description: Should Finland expand its Universal Basic Income pilot program to provide a safety net for all citizens and reduce poverty?
